Lyric:
[01:11.74][01:04.85][00:40.75][00:33.37]Conrazon De Melao, Melao Melao Melao

[01:15.58][01:07.94][00:44.47][00:36.79]Conrazon De Melao, Melao Melao Melao

[00:49.05]Emmanuel thinks about the girl

[00:50.75]He knows all too well

[00:52.63]She's got him a tangle

[00:54.25]And she's got him in her spell

[00:56.60]She dances with his mind

[00:58.18]And she dances on the floor

[01:00.41]And she knows how to drive him So lo-co!

[01:20.22]Emmanuel knows she's trouble

[01:21.94]But what else can he do

[01:23.74]She's got him 'round his finger

[01:25.65]With her different points of view

[01:27.72]She can dance away her troubles

[01:29.60]She's danced into his life

[01:31.59]She got him working hard for her

[01:33.33]All night!

[01:42.95][01:35.47]Conrazon De Melao,Melao Melao Melao

[01:46.70][01:38.86]Conrazon De Melao,Melao Melao Melao

[02:38.47]Emmanuel seen it all

[02:39.79]But no like this before

[02:41.78]A girl who turns up the heat

[02:44.67]By walking through the door

[02:45.89]And when she hits the dancing floor

[02:47.69]She burns up all the lights

[02:49.54]She's the one and only one thing in his sight

[02:53.44]Emmanuel just doesn't know

[02:55.46]Where this all is gonna lead

[02:57.33]He only know what he wants

[02:59.12]And what he really needs

[03:01.32]He needs to know

[03:02.86]What makes her tick

[03:03.74]And all her other games

[03:05.17]He knows no other woman

[03:07.15]Be the same

[03:16.49][03:09.07]Conrazon De Melao, Melao Melao Melao

[03:20.35][03:13.85]Conrazon De Melao, Melao Melao Melao
